contentrichtext.text: {{Notability|Companies|date=January 2011}} {{Unreferenced|date=January 2011}} '''Yellow Van Records''' is a [[record label]] set up by [[Sheffield]] band, [[Little Man Tate (band)|Little Man Tate]]. The label is a tribute to their old yellow van which was stolen along with their gear, at an early gig at Fibbers in [[York]]. This record label is often mistaken for a similar record label; 'Orange Van' ==Artists== * [[Little Man Tate (band)|Little Man Tate]] == Discography == * 2006 [[The Agent]] #117 UK * 2006 [[What? What You Got?]] #40 UK == See also == * [[List of record labels]] ==External links== * [http://www.littlemantate.co.uk Bands Official Website] [[Category:British record labels]] [[Category:Music in Sheffield|Little Man Tate]] [[Category:Vanity record labels]] [[Category:Indie music record labels]]
